Class ShippingDomainController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.cpsc.webshopping.controller.ShippingDomainController
@RestController public class ShippingDomainController extends Object
Interaction controller with the Shipping table in the database

  • Method Details

    • getShippingEntry

      @GetMapping("/get-shipping-entry/{shippingId}") public Shipping getShippingEntry(@PathVariable("shippingId") long shippingId)
      Returns the Shipping row with the associated id
      Parameters:
      shippingId - id of the entry to find
      Returns:
      the found Shipping item
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no entry is associated with the shippingId

    • editShippingEntry

      @PostMapping("/edit-shipping-entry") public void editShippingEntry(@Validated Shipping shipping)
      Edits the fields of the associated Shipping row to match the values of the passed Shipping item
      Parameters:
      shipping - Shipping instance with the new values
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no row in the database has the same id as the passed Shipping entry
